mapper.sql: SHIPPING_ID, NAME, COMPANY, COUNTRY, PROVINCE, CITY, DISTRICT, STREET, POSTCODE, MOBILE, EMAIL, TELPHONE, EN_RETURN_NAME, EN_RETURN_COMPANY, EN_RETURN_COUNTRY, EN_RETURN_PROVINCE, EN_RETURN_CITY, EN_RETURN_DISTRICT, EN_RETURN_STREET, EN_RETURN_POSTCODE, EN_RETURN_MOBILE, EN_RETURN_EMAIL, EN_RETURN_TELPHONE, CN_RETURN_NAME, CN_RETURN_COMPANY, CN_RETURN_COUNTRY, CN_RETURN_PROVINCE, CN_RETURN_CITY, CN_RETURN_DISTRICT, CN_RETURN_STREET, CN_RETURN_POSTCODE, CN_RETURN_MOBILE, CN_RETURN_EMAIL, CN_RETURN_TELPHONE
mapper.select:
select
from SHIPPING_ADDRESS_CONFIG where SHIPPING_ID = (select ID from SHIPPINGS where SHIPPING_NAME = #{shippingName, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.insert: insert into SHIPPING_ADDRESS_CONFIG (SHIPPING_ID, NAME, COMPANY, COUNTRY, PROVINCE, CITY, DISTRICT, STREET, POSTCODE, MOBILE, EMAIL, TELPHONE, EN_RETURN_NAME, EN_RETURN_COMPANY, EN_RETURN_COUNTRY, EN_RETURN_PROVINCE, EN_RETURN_CITY, EN_RETURN_DISTRICT, EN_RETURN_STREET, EN_RETURN_POSTCODE, EN_RETURN_MOBILE, EN_RETURN_EMAIL, EN_RETURN_TELPHONE, CN_RETURN_NAME, CN_RETURN_COMPANY, CN_RETURN_COUNTRY, CN_RETURN_PROVINCE, CN_RETURN_CITY, CN_RETURN_DISTRICT, CN_RETURN_STREET, CN_RETURN_POSTCODE, CN_RETURN_MOBILE, CN_RETURN_EMAIL, CN_RETURN_TELPHONE) values (#{shippingId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enReturnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enReturnCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enReturnCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enReturnProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enReturnCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enReturnDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enReturnStreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enReturnPostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enReturnMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enReturnEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enReturnTelphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnReturnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnReturnCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnReturnCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnReturnProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnReturnCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnReturnDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnReturnStreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnReturnPostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnReturnMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnReturnEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnReturnTelphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
